name: Wabi - Virtual Number for WeChat
description: Wabi is the quickest way to create a WeChat (Weixin) account!  Wabi provides clean, dedicated, non-recycled phone numbers, guaranteed to work with WeChat!  Why Wabi?  Not all numbers are compatible with WeChat. Most numbers are blocked from using WeChat, especially from other virtual number providers!  Forget about ordering another SIM and device, Get a number in a click of a button!  Get a Wabi number, and activate your WeChat account in 2 minutes!  WeChat allows you to chat and make voice or video calls with your friends and family, as well as see original content and pay to supported vendors and much more. WeChat has 1 billion users world wide, and is the most widespread chatting app in China.  WeChat is a must for anyone whos visiting China or has contacts in China to stay in touch with.  Visit our website for more information: Web: https://www.wabi-app.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wabiwhatsapp  Contact us for any questions: Email: wabi@applaud-software.com
